name: Google Tasks
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Tasks 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Tasks API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task
available_options: Task (值: task)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Add a task to tasklist
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a task
Get (值: get) - Retrieve a task
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many tasks from a tasklist
Update (值: update) - Update a task
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

task.name: task
task.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
task.natural_language_description: 参数名: TaskList Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the task

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: completedMax (值: None) - Upper bound for a task completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by
completedMin (值: None) - Lower bound for a task completion date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by
dueMin (值: None) - Lower bound for a task due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by
dueMax (值: None) - Upper bound for a task due date (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by
showCompleted (值: None) - Whether completed tasks are returned in the result. Show Hidden must also be True to show tasks completed in first party clients such as the web UI or Google's mobile apps.
showDeleted (值: None) - Whether deleted tasks are returned in the result
showHidden (值: None) - Whether hidden tasks are returned in the result
updatedMin (值: None) - Lower bound for a task last modification time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: completed (值: None) - Completion date of the task (as a RFC 3339 timestamp). This field is omitted if the task has not been completed.
deleted (值: None) - Whether the task has been deleted
dueDate (值: None) - Due date of the task
notes (值: None) - Additional Notes
previous (值: None) - Previous sibling task identifier. If the task is created at the first position among its siblings, this parameter is omitted.
status (值: None) - Current status of the task
title (值: None) - Title of the task
